Social And Cultural Activities: Convenor, Dr. Rammohan Rao Charitable Trust and She has served for the last 20 years by: (i)providing free drinking water supply in rural areas(ii)free medical camps (iii) free cataract operations to the blind (iv) construction and renovation of temples, churches and masjids and (v) encouraging students by conducting talent tests
Educational Qualifications: M.B.B.S. Educated at Andhra Medical College, Visakhapatanam, Andhra Pradesh
Other Information: Attended South-Asia initiative on women and HIV/AIDS policy-making at Washington from 7th to 10th December 2009
